items.title: Enhance Suno Lyric Generation in Platform Service ðŸŽ¶
items.summary: This update modifies the lyric generation process by changing the model to 'remi-v1' across multiple handlers. The docker-compose configuration has also been updated to redirect the service port from 3000 to 9200. These changes aim to improve the lyric generation capabilities and streamline the service's deployment.
